code: @Test public void createEndpointWithComponentElements() throws Exception {     DdbComponent component = new DdbComponent(context).     component.setAccessKey("XXX").     component.setSecretKey("YYY").     DdbEndpoint endpoint = (DdbEndpoint) component.createEndpoint("aws-ddb://myTable").     assertEquals("myTable", endpoint.getConfiguration().getTableName()).     assertEquals("XXX", endpoint.getConfiguration().getAccessKey()).     assertEquals("YYY", endpoint.getConfiguration().getSecretKey()). }

@Test public void createEndpointWithComponentAndEndpointElements() throws Exception {     DdbComponent component = new DdbComponent(context).     component.setAccessKey("XXX").     component.setSecretKey("YYY").     component.setRegion(Regions.US_WEST_1.toString()).     DdbEndpoint endpoint = (DdbEndpoint) component.createEndpoint("aws-ddb://myTable?accessKey=xxxxxx&secretKey=yyyyy&region=US_EAST_1").     assertEquals("myTable", endpoint.getConfiguration().getTableName()).     assertEquals("xxxxxx", endpoint.getConfiguration().getAccessKey()).     assertEquals("yyyyy", endpoint.getConfiguration().getSecretKey()).     assertEquals("US_EAST_1", endpoint.getConfiguration().getRegion()). }
